Module com.dlsc.gemsfx
Package com.dlsc.gemsfx

Class AutoscrollListView<T>

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.control.Control
javafx.scene.control.ListView<T>
com.dlsc.gemsfx.AutoscrollListView<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the item type
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
public class AutoscrollListView<T> extends javafx.scene.control.ListView<T>
A specialization of ListView that will automatically start to scroll up or down during drag and drop operations whenever the mouse cursor reaches the top or bottom of the view. The view currently only supports vertical orientation, although it should be straight-forward to add horizontal orientation as well.
